titles: A Declaration of the several treasons, blasphemies and misdemeanors acted, spoken and published against God, the late King, his present Majesty, the nobility, clergy, city, commonalty, &c. by that grand wizard and impostor William Lilly of St. Clements Danes, other wise called Merlinus Anglicus presented to the right honourable the members of the House of Parliament : in order to secure him from acting any further villanies against His Majesty.
author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.
Lilly, William, 1602-1681.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles II, 1660-1685 --  Sources.
